column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////The Malnati Chicago Classic is definitely the way to go if you don't like your 'za weighed down by superfluous ingredients. Just cheese
column3: and semi-sweet tomato sauce adorn the flaky buttercrust and it is all you ever need. The crust was by far my favorite part
column4: not super doughy like other Chicago-style pizzas I've tried
column5: with a tinge of buttery sweetness. One piece of pizza is never enough for this girl
column7: one is plenty. Take the rest home and enjoy the best pizza you've ever eaten for days to come!
